testcase.classname: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.name: user register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user Open the browser to register.....................................passed And user navigate to Home page..............................................passed And user navigate to register page..........................................passed When user enter valid data, first name is "Fahd" , last name is "Mahmoud", email is "fahd.tiger2022@gmail.com", company is "FWD", password is "123456" and confirm password is "123456".passed And user click on Register Button...........................................passed Then user Registration Successfully.........................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the System
testcase.name: User login with valid User name and password
testcase.system-out: Given user open the browser.................................................passed And user navigate to the login page.........................................passed When user enter Valid Data vaild Email is "fahd.tiger2022@gmail.com" , valid Password is "123456".passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed And user directed to the home page..........................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the System
testcase.name: User login with invalid user name , password
testcase.system-out: Given user open the browser.................................................passed And user navigate to the login page.........................................passed When user enter Invalid Login Data inavlid email is "fahd@gmail.com" , invalid Password is "123456".passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could Not login successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product name by click on search button
testcase.system-out: Given user Open the browser to search.......................................passed And user navigate to the Home page..........................................passed When user write product name in the search Text box in the Home page product name is "Apple".passed And user Click on search button.............................................passed Then the application directed to the URL Successfully_ProductName...........passed And product appeared........................................................passed

testcase.classname: users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product SKU by hit ENTER from Keyboard
testcase.system-out: Given user Open the browser to search.......................................passed And user navigate to the Home page..........................................passed When user write product SKU in the search Text box in the Home page Product SKU is "AP_MBP_13".passed And user hit Enter from keyboard............................................passed Then the application directed to the URL Successfully_SKU...................passed And product appeared........................................................passed
